thread.title: Obama’s Brother Posts Picture of BHO’s Supposed Real Birth Certificate
thread.title_full: Obama’s Brother Posts Picture of BHO’s Supposed Real Birth Certificate

author: Harris
title: Obama’s Brother Posts Picture of BHO’s Supposed Real Birth Certificate
text:
SHOCK: Archbishop Suggests Obama Pressured Pope Benedict Into Resigning 
This is the image Malik posted Thursday, asking his followers a simple question…“Surely what’s this?” 
The photo indicates that a “Barack Hussein Obama II” was born in Kenya at Coast Province General Hospital in Mombasa. This may be the revival of the birther movement and it is brought about by the former president’s own flesh and blood. Advertisement - story continues below 
It must be noted however, that Malik Obama was not the first person to break this image to the masses. This certificate of birth has been shared for sometime after it was unearthed in 2009 and offered briefly for sale on eBay. 
This is a serious topic, considering that the United States Constitution only permits natural born citizens to be come president. The topic of Obama’s place of birth became a hot button issue in 2008 because many believed that the former president was missing this key qualification. 
in 2011 the White House offered a separate document as proof of the president’s place of birth which indicates that he was born in Hawaii. Advertisement - story continues below
